headline: Lennox International (LII) Valuation Check After Revenue Drop And Earnings Guidance Disappointment
summary: Lennox International (LII) is back in focus after reporting a quarterly revenue decline of 11.2% and adjusted earnings per share that missed analyst forecasts, along with a softer 2026 earnings outlook. See our latest analysis for Lennox International. That weaker quarter and softer 2026 earnings outlook have come alongside a 1-day share price return of 2.27% decline and a 7-day share price return of 5.60% decline, while the 1-year total shareholder return of 18.56% decline contrasts with...

headline: LII Q4 Deep Dive: Destocking, Market Softness Weigh on Results, Management Eyes Stabilization in 2026
summary: Climate control solutions innovator Lennox International (NYSE:LII) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales falling 11.2% year on year to $1.20 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $4.45 per share was 5.7% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
